definitions.definition: ( chemistry ) Any inorganic material containing calcium , usually calcium oxide ( quicklime ) or calcium hydroxide ( slaked lime ).
( poetic ) Any gluey or adhesive substance that traps or captures; sometimes a synonym for birdlime .

main_definition: ( chemistry ) Any inorganic material containing calcium , usually calcium oxide ( quicklime ) or calcium hydroxide ( slaked lime ).
secondary_definitions: ( poetic ) Any gluey or adhesive substance that traps or captures; sometimes a synonym for birdlime .

definitions.definition: A deciduous tree of the genus Tilia , especially Tilia × europaea ; the linden tree.

main_definition: A deciduous tree of the genus Tilia , especially Tilia × europaea ; the linden tree.

definitions.definition: Any of several green citrus fruit , somewhat smaller and sharper-tasting than a lemon .
Any of the trees that bear limes, especially Key lime , Citrus aurantiifolia .
( uncountable ) Any of several brilliant , sometimes yellowish , green colours associated with the fruits of a lime tree.

subdefinitions.definition: A particular one of those colours that has been standardized under this name, at least in some organizations' standards.

definitions.definition: ( fandom slang ) A fan fiction story which contains sexual references, but stops short of full , explicit descriptions of sexual activity (coined by analogy with lemon ).

main_definition: Any of several green citrus fruit , somewhat smaller and sharper-tasting than a lemon .
secondary_definitions: Any of the trees that bear limes, especially Key lime , Citrus aurantiifolia .
( uncountable ) Any of several brilliant , sometimes yellowish , green colours associated with the fruits of a lime tree.
( fandom slang ) A fan fiction story which contains sexual references, but stops short of full , explicit descriptions of sexual activity (coined by analogy with lemon ).

definitions.definition: ( Caribbean , Trinidad & Tobago ) A casual gathering to socialize.

main_definition: ( Caribbean , Trinidad & Tobago ) A casual gathering to socialize.

definitions.definition: Alternative form of lyam ( “ a leash ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative form of lyam ( “ a leash ” ) .
